payment_requirement: Full retail OR financing paid in full
notes: If payoff done online/app or with Verizon gift card, unlock delayed 35 days for fraud verification

payment_requirement: Paid and active service for 365 days
notes: Not unlocked if device reported lost/stolen or fraud

payment_requirement: Device paid in full / installment balance zero
notes: Early upgrade on 2-year contract may require 30-day wait

payment_requirement: If financed/leased, all payments satisfied and device paid in full
notes: Remote unlock within two business days once eligible

payment_requirement: If <365 days, account must have >$100 in refills and >14 days since purchase
notes: Max 2 unlocks per line in last 12 months
